module.name: Custom Applications
module.description: Registry to add custom extensions and destinations that may be created and used so that the Extensions and Destinations Registry can include these.
module.changelog: *12.0.3.2* FREEPBX-9874 - Fix variable names *12.0.3.1* Fix installation issues *12.0.2* FREEPBX-9234 Escape out the exception *12.0.1* Add advanced 'Return' function. *2.11.0.2* Add license info *2.11.0.1* Custom Application Popover Allowance *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes
